meanings.definition: A film made for television broadcast.
meanings.sent1: Last night, we watched a thrilling telefilm about a detective solving a mystery.
meanings.sent2: The telefilm we saw yesterday had amazing special effects and a captivating storyline.
meanings.sent3: The telefilm we watched was so funny that we couldn't stop laughing at the cheesy acting.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a never-ending telefilm, full of unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The telefilm painted a vivid picture of life in a small town, capturing the essence of community.

meanings.definition: To produce or direct a telefilm.
meanings.sent1: The director decided to telefilm the new series to reach a wider audience.
meanings.sent2: She telefilms exciting stories that keep viewers on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent3: When asked about his job, he joked that he gets to telefilm for a living.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for storytelling led her to telefilm tales of adventure and romance.
meanings.sent5: The team worked tirelessly to telefilm the action-packed scenes for the upcoming telefilm.
